Member Function Documentation

bool tbb::internal::hash_map_segment_base::internal_grow_predicate ( ) const

True if my_logical_size>=my_physical_size.

Used to support Intel(R) Thread Checker.

Definition at line 47 of file concurrent_hash_map.cpp.

References max_physical_size, my_logical_size, and my_physical_size.

47  {
48  // Intel(R) Thread Checker considers the following reads to be races, so we hide them in the
49  // library so that Intel(R) Thread Checker will ignore them. The reads are used in a double-check
50  // context, so the program is nonetheless correct despite the race.
51  return my_logical_size >= my_physical_size && my_physical_size < max_physical_size;
52 }
